name: Kathmandu Tandoori House
review:
Great option for Indian and nepali food. The chicken momos were excellent and the sauce that comes with them was stellar. 
Chicken biryani was also good,.... What a wonderful surprise to be in a neighborhood near the Madrid neighborhood & to find excellent India/Nepali food! Very delicious with attentive service.. I had the tikka masala and tandoori chicken.  Both were very very good!  The host was very nice and helpful. It's a quiet neighborhood restaurant with....

name: La Torino
review: I've eaten here twice while in Bajaras.  The first time I had the stuffed sea bass which was amazing.  The second time I had  the mixed salad and oxtail.... I loved this place! I had a few hour layovers in Madrid. It's about a 9 minute Uber ride from the airport. So if you have a bit of time between flights it's.... Loved this place! We had an unremarkable dinner and were looking for somewhere to celebrate the end of our 10 days in Spain. The staff were so friendly and....

name: Campanilla
review: Nos quedamos una noche en Barajas  y encontramos este pequeño restaurante familiar a través de Yelp. Fue una experiencia inolvidable! La comida fue.... This was our last night in Spain. We needed a meal within walking distance from the airport hotel. We did not expect to have the most memorable of our.... Such a great experience.  I am from Louisville, KY - the food was great.  Great wine.  Very authentic!  Would absolutely go back..

name: Al Traste Fun And Food
review:
For me the best place in the area. 
Really good meat and very good service. 
Nice beers. 
Go for the grilled meat!
Also with extended hours which is very.... We were staying in a cheap hotel up the street and were flying out or Madrid airport the next day. This was close to the hotel so we decided to give it a.... On the last night of a two week holiday in Spain we checked into a typical airport area hotel and ventured out for one last dinner in Madrid. We slid Into....

name: Asador Nuevo Porche
review: All things are perfect. Food is fantastic. The boss is kindly and friendly. Wine is tasted smoothy and also more beer. Quite a good representative of the traditional "asador" (rosters) tradition in Spain. Impressive interior reproducing a Basque vernacular farm house. With.... We had an amazing time. Food was excellent and the service was tremendous. Our server was very helpful and even the owner attended us. If you want a good....

name: La Latina
review:
This is a nice little charming restaurant in Barajas.  I was really happy with the quality of the food and how flavorful it was.  I walked by the night.... In the Madrid airport area for one evening ahead of a flight the next day and staying down the street at the Clement Barajes Hotel.

On a Saturday night, I.... A great place for lunch! A delicious salad, a main course, a bottle of pineapple juice and a tasty pudding only cost me 10 euros altogether. Their dishes....

name: La Vina de Nerea
review: Very friendly and casual.  Quick service. Nice wine selection at reasonable prices and excellent tapas. A great place to unwind after a busy day of.... Outstanding tapas. I let the wait staff choose as I could not make out one from another. Must try the croquette, Spanish ham and a fish pâté. Try the house.... Was staying in nearby airport hotel for flight out next day. About a ten minute walk from TRYP Hotel is this lovely restaurant. Actually two restaurants in....

name: Martes 13
review: This isn't just a casual five stars.  Completely legit.  Stunningly ridiculous.  Do not pass on the artichokes.  Best I've ever had..

review: While service was good, the food was sub par compared to real Japanese food.  The rice tasted like the ones you can get at supermarkets where I am from.... Ok so trip advisor said that this place was good so we tried it. The food actually made me sick! The fish was not good and the rice was very over cooked. I.... Their sashimi was served at room temperature and the tuna was actually grey. I got sick and finally had to get antibiotics. Great way to start a vacation..
